title: Average weekly wage
context: [ยง392-7] Average weekly wage. The &ldquo;average weekly wage&rdquo; for the purpose of computing the weekly benefit amount shall be based upon the wages that the employee would receive from the employee&rsquo;s employer except for the employee&rsquo;s disability. In the case of salaried employees the &ldquo;average weekly wage&rdquo; shall be the weekly salary of the employee in the last week prior to the commencement of disability.
